message.content:
{
  "structured": {
    "name": "Hadeer Ezzat Abdel-Razek",
    "contact": {
      "email": "hadeerezzat234@gmail.com",
      "phone": "01158227183",
      "linkedin": "linkedin.com/in/hadeer-ezzat-9b5b70247",
      "github": null,
      "portfolio": null
    },
    "location": {
      "city": "6th of October City, Giza",
      "country": "Egypt"
    },
    "current_title": "HR & Admin Specialist",
    "total_experience_years": 3,
    "education": [
      {
        "degree": "Bachelor’s Degree in Egyptian Archaeology (Egyptology Section)",
        "institution": "Cairo University",
        "year": 2021
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "HR & Admin Specialist",
        "company": "Capital Engineering Consultancy",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": "Present",
        "highlights": [
          "Advertising job openings on job boards, company website, social media, and industry-specific platforms",
          "Conducting phone calls to assess candidates’ fit for roles; shortlisting candidates and preparing them for interviews",
          "Coordinating new hire onboarding (paperwork, orientation, training)",
          "Handling workforce data updates and maintaining accurate employee records, including headcount reports",
          "Managing attendance, leaves, and performance appraisal forms",
          "Maintaining office supplies and organized filing systems for documents and records",
          "Coordinating travel arrangements and accommodations for staff",
          "Supporting HR team with administrative duties like document collection and filing",
          "Managing maintenance requests and following up with vendors",
          "Ensuring smooth daily operations and addressing facility issues",
          "Assisting in organizing internal events, trainings, and meetings",
          "Monitoring office budget and petty cash handling"
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Administrative Specialist",
        "company": "Al-Safy Group",
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Assisting with budgeting and cost control efforts across various departments",
          "Preparing monthly reports detailing factory expenditures and operational costs",
          "Managed vendor contracts, procurement, and office supply chain",
          "Monitoring and following up on service contracts related to facility management and ensuring compliance with agreed terms",
          "Coordinating with external vendors and service providers to ensure smooth day-to-day operations",
          "Supported HR with attendance tracking and employee-related documentation",
          "Ensured compliance with workplace safety, budgeting, and cost-control procedures",
          "Handling procurement requests and office supply management"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Talent Acquisition & Recruitment",
      "Employee Onboarding & Engagement",
      "Performance Management & Appraisals",
      "Personnel File Handling",
      "Policy Implementation & Compliance",
      "Administrative Operations & Vendor Management",
      "MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)",
      "Communication",
      "Organizational Skills"
    ],
    "tools": [
      "Microsoft Word",
      "Microsoft Excel",
      "Microsoft PowerPoint",
      "Microsoft Outlook"
    ],
    "certifications": [],
    "languages": [
      "Arabic",
      "English"
    ],
    "projects": [
      {
        "name": "Dedo Handmade",
        "description": "Founder; created and marketed handmade collections catering to diverse customer preferences.",
        "tech": []
      }
    ]
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 14,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 0,
      "experience_impact": 3,
      "performance_productivity": 4,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 1,
      "leadership_collaboration": 3,
      "education_certifications": 2,
      "projects_initiative": 1
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "mid",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "3+ years experience in HR/admin operations including recruitment support, onboarding, compliance, reporting, and vendor management",
        "Strong communication and organizational skills explicitly stated and supported by coordination-heavy responsibilities",
        "Bilingual: Arabic (native/bilingual) and English (professional working proficiency)"
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No evidence of JavaScript or any full-stack/MERN development skills (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)",
        "No software engineering experience, projects, or technical tooling (TypeScript, REST/GraphQL, testing frameworks, CI/CD, Docker, cloud) mentioned",
        "Location preference is England/Europe, while candidate location is Egypt; no stated willingness/ability to work across England/Europe time zones or relocate"
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume describes an HR & Admin Specialist profile with recruitment, onboarding, compliance, and administrative operations experience. The target role is senior fullstack MERN developer requiring JavaScript and extensive web engineering competencies; none are present in the resume, so the fit is very low.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "HR & Admin Specialist",
      "HR Generalist",
      "Talent Acquisition Specialist",
      "Recruitment Coordinator",
      "HR Operations Specialist",
      "Office Administrator"
    ]
  }
}

        "Strong communication skill explicitly stated and reflected in responsibilities (interviews, stakeholder collaboration).",

        "No evidence of TypeScript, API development, testing tools (Jest/Cypress), CI/CD, Docker, or cloud deployments.",

  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],

Core requirements for a senior fullstack MERN developer (JavaScript, React/Node, MongoDB, APIs, testing, CI/CD) are not evidenced, so fit is very low despite meeting Arabic/English language preference and showing communication skills.",

      {
